mapper.sql: select s.id as stationId, s.street, c. id as cityId, c.cityName, s1.id as stationFromId, s1.street as streetFrom, c1.id as cityFromId, c1.cityName as cityFromName, r.distance from stations s inner join cities c on (s.city_id = c.id) inner join route r on (s.id = r.station_to) inner join stations s1 on (s1.id = r.station_from) inner join cities c1 on (s1.city_id = c1.id)
